Test Name: Quantification of Hydroxyglutaric Acids, Glutaric Acid, Ethylmalonic Acid, and Methylsuccinic Acid (Blood Spot)
Purpose: To quantify Hydroxyglutaric Acids, Glutaric Acid, Ethylmalonic Acid, and Methylsuccinic Acid in dried blood spots for diagnosis of organic acidemias.
Container: Dried blood spot filter paper card
